title: How the Chiefs and 49ers built their teams
itunes:title: How the Chiefs and 49ers built their teams
description:
DJ and Bucky are back with a new episode. First, the pair breakdown the quarterbacks for the Super Bowl teams, while looking at how the Chiefs acquired QB Patrick Mahomes and the guys also focus on 49ers QB Jimmy Garoppolo (1:59). After, the duo discusses how each team's roster was constructed through the draft, free agency and trades (12:10). Then, the guys look at what path Chiefs GM Brett Veach and 49ers GM John Lynch took to get to their current jobs (22:46). To wrap up, DJ and Bucky compare Chiefs head coach Andy Reid and 49ers head coach Kyle Shanahan, with a focus on their offenses and coaching style (31:16).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
